refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a copy of the given instance with the schema reference removed.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function returns a copy of the given instance with the schema reference removed.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The function returns a new instance of XMLType.

example.title: Converting a schema-based instance to non schema-based
example.para: The procedure creates a non schema-based copy of a sample schema-based instance.
